title: Preparing for HTB CPTS Exam
description: Currently preparing for the Hack The Box Certified Penetration Testing Specialist (CPTS) exam to enhance penetration testing skills, through solving practical offensive security labs.

title: Solved "Flight" Machine by Hack The Box
description: Solved the "Flight" machine by Hack The Box, a hard difficulty Windows machine focusing on LFI, password spraying, SMB share exploitation, and DCSync attacks.

title: Solved "Search" Machine by Hack The Box
description: Solved the "Search" machine by Hack The Box, a hard difficulty Windows machine focusing on Kerberoasting, password hunting, and gMSA privilege escalation.
